text: E jenumanja wankulupilile! Kumbuchilani chindimba cha Allah pa jenumanja, pandema jawasachilile wandu kuti ajongole makono gao kukwenu (kusaka kumputa ngondo), basi (Allah) ni wagachijile makono gaogo kuti gakanyyichila wanganyammwe, soni mun'jogopani Allah, soni kwa Allah pe basi ajegamile wakulupilila
